entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
